{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21402v1", "title": "A product of strongly quasi-nonexpansive mappings in Hadamard spaces", "summary": "In this paper, we prove that the product of strongly quasi-nonexpansive
$\Delta$-demiclosed mappings is also a strongly quasi-nonexpansive orbital
$\Delta$-demiclosed mapping in Hadamard spaces. Additionally, we establish the
$\Delta$-convergence theorem for approximating a common fixed point of infinite
products of these mappings in Hadamard spaces. Our results have practical
applications in convex function minimization, the minimization of the sum of
finitely many convex functions, and solving the convex feasibility problem for
finitely many sets in Hadamard spaces.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA", "published": "2025-04-30T08:03:28Z"}
